# uoastock

Display Top 20day Average Options Volume by ticker.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/op uoastock [price]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| price | Filter by stocks over a certain price | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/op uoastock
```

```
/op uoastock price:50
```
